name: Edmunds
description:
This is a story-based thriller mystery game. 

For a better experience please play in fullscreen mode!

We did this game with 3 people in 48 hours. 

Game Design, Coding, Dialogue: Seden Canpolat
Game Design Coding: Nur Ceylin Çetin
2D Artist: Selma İrem Özdemir

In our game, we used music without copyrights.
